specials.name: Poison
specials.text: Your Opponents pokemon takes 1 damage in between both turns.

specials.name: Super Poison
specials.text: Your Opponents pokemon takes 2 damage in between both turns.

specials.name: Confusion
specials.text: Before your Opponents next attack they flip a coin. If Heads their active pokemon takes 1 damage instead.

specials.name: Paralyzed
specials.text: Before your Opponents next attack they flip a coin. If Heads nothing happens.

specials.name: Burn
specials.text: Your Opponents Pokemon takes 1 damage in between both turns.

specials.name: Recharging
specials.text: Your Pokemon does nothing on your next turn.

specials.name: Perish Song
specials.text: Your Opponents Pokemon is cursed and will faint in 5 turns from this attack. Your Pokemon cannot switch out or attack until this effect ends.

specials.name: Infatuation
specials.text: Your Opponents Pokemon's next attack does -3 damage.

specials.name: Power Boost
specials.text: This attack does +2 damage. Your Opponents Pokemon's next attack does +1 damage.

specials.name: Semi-Invulnerable
specials.text: Your next attack does no damage. Your Opponents Pokemon does half damage (rounded down) next turn.

specials.name: Seeded
specials.text: Your Opponents Pokemon takes 1 damage in between turns. This Pokemon gains +1 HP in between each turn.

specials.name: Getting Pumped
specials.text: For every consecutive attack with getting pumped add +1 damage to your next attack.

specials.name: Reversal
specials.text: If your pokemon attacks first but its speed is slower than your opponents, this attack does +5 damage.
